commands.name: az sig gallery-application create
commands.syntax:
az sig gallery-application create --application-name
                                  --gallery-name
                                  --os-type {Linux, Windows}
                                  --resource-group
                                  [--description]
                                  [--location]
                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--tags]
examples: az sig gallery-application create --gallery-name MyGallery --name AppName -g MyResourceGroup --os-type windows

commands.name: az sig gallery-application delete
commands.syntax:
az sig gallery-application delete [--application-name]
                                  [--gallery-name]
                                  [--ids]
                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--resource-group]
                                  [--subscription]
                                  [--yes]

commands.name: az sig gallery-application list
commands.summary: List gallery Application Definitions in a gallery.

commands.name: az sig gallery-application show
commands.summary: Get information about a gallery Application Definition.

commands.name: az sig gallery-application update
commands.syntax:
az sig gallery-application update [--add]
                                  [--application-name]
                                  [--description]
                                  [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--gallery-name]
                                  [--ids]
                                  [--location]
                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--remove]
                                  [--resource-group]
                                  [--set]
                                  [--subscription]
                                  [--tags]
examples: az sig gallery-application update --gallery-name GalleryName --name AppName -g MyResourceGroup --description Description --tags tag=MyTag

commands.name: az sig gallery-application wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
